member.name: M:Poker.Card.ToString
member.returns: The string value of the cards

member.name: T:Poker.IPokerHandsChecker
member.summary: Interface for checking poker hands as defined in http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_poker_hands.

member.name: M:Poker.PokerHandsChecker.IsValidHand(Poker.IHand)
member.summary: Checks if the hand contains exactly five cards
member.returns: Returns true if the hand consists of five cards and has no repeating cards

member.name: M:Poker.PokerHandsChecker.ContainsRepeatingCards(Poker.IHand)
member.summary: Checks if the hand contains repeated cards
member.returns: True if any repeating cards are found

member.name: M:Poker.PokerHandsChecker.IsStraightFlush(Poker.IHand)
member.summary: Checks if the hand is a strraight flush hand
member.returns: True if the hand is a straight flush hand

member.name: M:Poker.PokerHandsChecker.IsFourOfAKind(Poker.IHand)
member.summary: Checks if the hand contains four of a kind cards
member.returns: True if the hand contains four of a kind cards

member.name: M:Poker.PokerHandsChecker.IsFullHouse(Poker.IHand)
member.summary: Checks if the hand is a full house hand
member.returns: True if the hand is a full house hand

member.name: M:Poker.PokerHandsChecker.IsFlush(Poker.IHand)
member.summary: Checks if the hand is a flush
member.returns: True if the hand is a flush

member.name: M:Poker.PokerHandsChecker.IsStraight(Poker.IHand)
member.summary: Checks if the hand is a straight
member.returns: Returns true if the hand is a straigh hand

member.name: M:Poker.PokerHandsChecker.IsThreeOfAKind(Poker.IHand)
member.summary: Checks if the hand contains three of a kind cards
member.returns: Returns true if the hand contains three cards from the same face and does not qualify fo a full house hand

member.name: M:Poker.PokerHandsChecker.GetThreeOfAKind(Poker.IHand)
member.summary: Checks if the hand contains three cards from the same face
member.returns: Returns true if the hand contains three cards from the same face

member.name: M:Poker.PokerHandsChecker.ContainsTwoPair(Poker.IHand)
member.summary: Checks if the hand contains two pairs
member.returns: Returns true if the hand contains two pairs

member.name: M:Poker.PokerHandsChecker.ContainsOnePair(Poker.IHand)
member.summary: Checks if the hand contains one pair
member.returns: Returns true if the hand contains one pair

member.name: M:Poker.PokerHandsChecker.IsHighCard(Poker.IHand)
member.summary: Checks if the hand qualifies as a high hand by not qualifying for any other specific type of hands
member.returns: Returns true if no other type of hands are valid
